Description: One ear-ring made of jasper and 31 beads made of faience. A: Fragment of an ear-ring, made of jasper, roughly triangular in section, two circumferential lines parallel to the edge with small notches at the edge creating a ribbing. Very well smoothed. B: One cylindrical bead made of faience, faint traces of light green glaze. C: One cylindrical segmented bead made of faience, faint traces of light green glaze. D: 29 dish-shaped beads, made of faience, white.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
